DOC.brief_summary: To compare patient comfort and overall lens cleanliness with consecutive use of two multipurpose lens solutions.
DOC.brief_title: Comfort and Cleaning Evaluation of Multipurpose Solutions in Contact Lens Patients
DOC.criteria: 1. Patients 18 yrs or older 2. Males or females 3. Any race or ethnic background 4. CL patients using OptiFree Express norub MPS currently 5. Patients using Focus night and day Lenses 1. Corneal refractive surgery within 6 months of this study. 2. Corneal ectasia. 3. Current use of Restasis
